mTitle: Beta 4 - Light Sensor and Notification LED

mText: enable up to 100 WebSockets (only one session per socket!)
The last days I worked on publishing the aBrain REST API to GitHub and creating the Play Store entry. aBrain is now avaiable as closed beta! I'm looking for some interested beta tester.
... welcome you on my new page (I have changed from Jekyll to AngularJS.)! Next, I will publish a REST-API of my current project.
